original_text: I have many more things to tell you. But you are not strong enough to know them now.
korean_text: 내가 아직도 너희에게 이를 것이 많으나 지금은 너희가 감당하지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: I have many more things to tell you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 더 많은 것을 말하려 한다.

sentences.original_text: But you are not strong enough
